__e: All that matters is that the streets of London are safe again.
I have reliable sources that say he's here!
As I said before some people are sure when they come, others are not.
Knowing that the people I care about are safe, and having some sense of closure for the ones we've lost.
We need to know that they're safe and then we can talk about what it is that you want.
I need to tell my mother, my sister, that they're safe and that he's rotting in hell.
I just know we're not safe here.
We have to get a train and go somewhere.We ain't safe here.
I'm not asking you to understand... or to have faith, but... the end of the world is coming, and... we're a lot safer out here.
-Streets aren't safe for a girl like you.
And now things are much less safe to me.
The streets of old city are no longer safe for your kind.
